title: Handle a Broken Bike Rack on a Bus
description: A passenger reports that the bike rack on the front of a bus is broken and they cannot use it.

tasks.description: Receive a report about a broken bike rack on a specific bus.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent logs the issue, including the bus number.

tasks.description: The agent creates a maintenance work order for the bus to have the bike rack repaired.
The agent apologizes to the passenger for the inconvenience and informs them that the next bus on the route should have a working rack.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent provides good customer service.
